entry_count.description: The total number of entries for this leaderboard

SegmentLeaderboardEntry.description: A row in a segment leaderboard

athlete_id.description: The unique identifier of the athlete

average_hr.description: The average cadence of the effort associated with this entry

average_watts.description: The average wattage of the effort associated with this entry

elapsed_time.description: The elapsed of the segment effort associated with this entry

moving_time.description: The moving of the segment effort associated with this entry

start_date.description: The time at which the effort was started.

start_date_local.description: The time at which the effort was started in the local timezone.

activity_id.description: The unique identifier of the activity associated with this entry

effort_id.description: The unique identifier of the segment effort associated with this entry

rank.description: The rank of this entry in the leaderboard

athlete_profile.description: The URL of the athlete's profile picture
